title: Lag-Is it the entire server or?
body: I never dealt with bad ping for this long in-game (over the course of a week pretty much), so, I have come to the conclusion that the server is really busy or something other. I always lag badly right after patches, It is not just me or my internet, right?

replies.body:
As *Rineyy* mentioned, our connection guide is a great place to start in troubleshooting this issue. Typically large changes in latency are caused by ISP network routing to the server, but can sometimes be caused by local network configurations. 

If you continue to see higher latency after working through that guide, please let me know.
Thank you for the link, I will try it.
